question.title: how to automatically switch the kafka client to another cluster without restart
question.body:
I learnning kafka active/standy cluster , by read the cloudera article of Connection to the cluster with configured DNS aliasesï¼Œi have some questions.

important part of above link article: If the client has discovered a cluster and is actively using it, and the cluster suddenly stops, the client tries to connect to the bootstrap servers it got from the DNS server before the bootstrap phase. So it does not automatically ask the DNS server for new bootstrap servers and does not fail over to the other cluster, even if the DNS records have already been changed.

my questions: has any solution can automatically switch kafka client reconnect the standy cluster without restart kafka client ?

I used the dnsmasq service to simulate a disaster recovery scenario, and I found that the Kafka client could not automatically switch the connected standy cluster unless I manually restarted the kafka client
